educational_materials.title: SAT Math Formula Sheet
educational_materials.content: Important formulas for SAT Mathematics: Area of circle = πr², Quadratic formula = (-b ± √(b²-4ac))/2a, Distance formula = √((x₂-x₁)² + (y₂-y₁)²)
